content.text: Match ends, Recreativo 0, Hércules 2.
Second Half ends, Recreativo 0, Hércules 2.

Foul by Jesús Rubio (Recreativo).
Goal!  Recreativo 0, Hércules 2. Adrián Sardinero (Hércules) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ignacio González.
